---
#########
##TidyR##
#########
---

```{r}
install.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse)
```

## Ejemplo gather()

```{r}
table4a
gather(table4a, `1999`, `2000`, key = "año", value = "población") 
```

## Ejemplo spread()

```{r}
table2
spread(table2, key = type, value = count)
```

## Ejemplo separate()

```{r}
table3
separate(table3, rate, into = c("cases", "population"), sep = "/", convert = TRUE) 
```

##Ejemplo unite()

```{r}
table5
unite(table5, new, century, year, sep = "") 
```
